Address.value: 20 EAST GREENWAY PLAZA,SUITE 540, HOUSTON, Texas, 77046, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sunnova Energy International Inc is a residential solar and energy storage service provider company. It offers services such as operations and maintenance, monitoring, repairs and replacements, equipment upgrades and onsite power optimization. The products and services offered by the group include Add-on battery storage, Home solar protection plans, New solar battery storage, and various other solar systems.

value.name: Paul S. Mathews
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
